meanings: Noun 유머 깜빡함(특히 나이 많은 사람의 특징으로 여겨지는 건망증 현상)

vlive.korean: 너의 순간이 다! You moment all! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
'천장지구' 여주인공이 누구였지? Who was the female lead for "A Moment of Romance"? 듣기 View video VICTON : 월요일밤!!병찬이랑
vlive.english: Who was the female lead for "A Moment of Romance"?

vlive.korean: [용인대 막내예요 데헷] 마지막에 뭐였죠? [I'm the youngest member, hehe] What was it at the last moment? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 23. 현재 1위 츄플에게 도전하는 경희대 래빈 & 용인 리퍼블릭!
vlive.english: [I'm the youngest member, hehe] What was it at the last moment?

vlive.korean: [정답은 '모든 날 모든 순간'] '모든 날 모든 순간'까지 아니야? [Answer is "Every Day, Every Moment"] Isn't is "Every Day, Every Moment"? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Answer is "Every Day, Every Moment"] Isn't is "Every Day, Every Moment"?

vlive.korean: '모든 날 모든 순간이 너였다' 아니에요? - '모든 날'이 뭐야? Isn't it "Every Day, Every Moment"? - What's the song? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: Isn't it "Every Day, Every Moment"? - What's the song?

examples.korean: This was the moment he had been dreading. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이것은 그가 몹시 두려워해 오던 순간이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This was the moment he had been dreading. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This is the proudest moment of my life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 순간은 제 생애에서 가장 자랑스러운 순간입니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This is the proudest moment of my life. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She savoured the moment with obvious relish. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 분명히 아주 즐겁게 그 순간을 음미했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She savoured the moment with obvious relish. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The senator pondered the question for a moment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상원의원이 그 질문을 잠시 곰곰이 생각했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The senator pondered the question for a moment. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At that moment she felt the first twitch of anxiety. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 순간 그녀는 처음으로 갑자기 불안감이 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At that moment she felt the first twitch of anxiety. Add to Wordbook
